modName: Klemm - Nord Barbarian Companion by Den987
summary: This mod add New Companion Klemm - Nord Barbarian
descriptionHtml:
This mod add New Companion Klemm - Nord Barbarian
You can find his in Jorvasskr
Essential , Auto-Level , 2H Sword
Install:
Simple setup all files from archive to your Data folder and Activate 
Uninstall: Delete ..esp and bsa
Requires : Apachii Sky Hair
Recomended : Younger Faces
author: Den987
